subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the significance of the 73rd and 74th Amendments in Panchayati Raj system?
question_hi: 73वें और 74वें संविधान क्या पंचायती विधान के मूल्य और 74वें संविधान क्या पंचायती विधान के मूल्य
A_en: The 73rd Amendment introduced direct elections to the Panchayati Raj institutions while the 74th Amendment introduced the Lok Jyoti Award for outstanding rural development work.
A_hi: 73वें संविधान पंचायती विधान के मूल्य के मूल्य।
B_en: The 73rd Amendment allowed the reservation of seats for Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes in Panchayati Raj institutions while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Gram Panchayat.
B_hi: 73वें संविधान पंचायती विधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
C_en: The 73rd Amendment revamped the rural local governance structure while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Gram Panchayat.,
C_hi: 73वें संविधान आधारन के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
D_en: The 73rd Amendment enhanced the powers of Gram Panchayats while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Zila Parishad.
D_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
E_en: The 73rd Amendment strengthened the powers of Gram Panchayat Raj while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Municipal Corporation.
E_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
F_en: The 73rd Amendment improved the status of Gram Panchayats while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Municipal Corporation.
F_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
G_en: The 73rd Amendment enhanced the powers of Panchayat Raj while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Nagar Palika.
G_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
H_en: The 73rd Amendment revamped the Local Self-Government Act while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Municipal Corporation.
H_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
I_en: The 73rd Amendment introduced the Gram Panchayat Raj while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Municipal Corporation.
I_hi: 73वें संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान के मूल्य।
question_en: What are the key changes brought by the 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution related to Panchayat Raj?
question_hi: 73वें संविधान संविधान के मूल्य, 74वें संविधान संविधान के मूल्य।

options_en.option_en_explanation: The 73rd Amendment strengthened the powers of Gram Panchayat and District Councils, while the 74th Amendment introduced the concept of Metropolitan Municipalities.
